channel.title: Site Discussion / Suggestions
channel.description: Discussion for all topics relating to the site, BeyondUnreal.com.

item.title: Wiki.BeyondUnreal DEAD?!
item.author: invalid@example.com (ROSoldier)
item.dc:creator: ROSoldier
item.content:encoded:
Hello guys the Beyond Unreal wiki website is not responding! Please acknowledge!
I hope website gets restored soon!

item.title: Official Forum Issues Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded: If you are having any issues with the upgrade to xenForo please post them here to get them resolved.

item.title: BU Logo concepts
item.author: invalid@example.com (_Lynx)
item.dc:creator: _Lynx
item.content:encoded:
Not only Epic is looking for a new logo, BeyondUnreal does as well!

The current logo used in the dark design is a simplified version of a 3 year old design, modified to match the flat design of black FlatAwesome theme.

This one was made in 2012, but pretty much never used except for square version on Youtube and Twitter:
​

The idea was to make a new take on the original logo. The old Unreal U has changed, and was never available...

BU Logo concepts

item.title: Firefox isn't connectng to BU and forums today
item.author: invalid@example.com (Manticore)
item.dc:creator: Manticore
item.content:encoded:
I'm on IE at the moment but usually use FF.

When trying to connect to the servers at BU I get this error message:

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to forums.beyondunreal.com. The OCSP server has no status for the certificate. (Error code: sec_error_ocsp_unknown_cert)

The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.
Click to expand...
Evidently this issue has arisen before with Firefox and...

Firefox isn't connectng to BU and forums today

item.title: Can't create an account on Liandri Wiki?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Metalfist)
item.dc:creator: Metalfist
item.content:encoded:
Liandri Wiki said:
You are free to edit the site without creating an account, but if you're interested in doing more than just a few random edits, getting an account can be very useful. It's a painless process, it allows other editors on the site to get to know you better (for example, seeing where your interests lie), and gives you access to additional features.
Click to expand...
It is supposed to be a "painless process", but I...

Can't create an account on Liandri Wiki?

item.title: User title
item.author: invalid@example.com (Al)
item.dc:creator: Al
item.content:encoded: Did the ability to change your user title go away? I want to edit mine from "Changer" to something else, but I don't see the option in the user control panel anymore. Am I just blind?

item.title: Auto lock threads
item.author: invalid@example.com (Syri)
item.dc:creator: Syri
item.content:encoded:
I'd like to suggest, if possible, some way of auto-locking a thread once it's been inactive for a certain length of time (say 1 year with no posts). This would prevent necro posting, which has been happening a lot in the UT section at the moment, and has happened in other areas before as well.
If anyone has anything constructive to add to an old thread, they can always request a mod unlock it, or post a new thread and link to the old one, to show they are continuing from that. This would...

Auto lock threads

item.title: More spam since switch?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
Anyone else noticed spam popping up more often since the switch the XenForo?

Anything we can do about it?

item.title: Slacking in the news section - why?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Vaskadar)
item.dc:creator: Vaskadar
item.content:encoded:
The last post was about Killing Floor 2.

There's news about global illumination in UE4, there's news about a new KF2 map.

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Links for UT99 Essential Files
item.author: invalid@example.com (BigSpeck)
item.dc:creator: BigSpeck
item.content:encoded: The essential files section for Unreal Tournament on the site seems to not link to the patches and bonus packs properly. I tried it on a couple different browsers, so I'm not sure if it's only on my end or not. Might be worth looking into.

item.title: Login Issues
item.author: invalid@example.com (GnBanditoCI5)
item.dc:creator: GnBanditoCI5
item.content:encoded:
Heyt Guys,

I was having issues where it did not send me the verification email to activate my account so I could post threads and replies etc.

However, Sir_Brizz sent me an email asking if I could post now, and thats what this thread is being posted for, as a test to see if i can !...so here go...clicking submit new thread <crossing fingers>.....

item.title: Liandri Archives general discussion thread or subforum?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neon_Knight)
item.dc:creator: Neon_Knight
item.content:encoded:
I've noticed that the Liandri Archives wiki is the only part of BU which hasn't any subforum. While at first I've barred it as the wiki having its own discussion sections, I've noticed that the Unreal Wiki has in fact an own subforum. And there isn't even a "general discussion" thread about the LA Wiki as well.

I think it's critical for this Wiki to have either onr or the other because not only...

Liandri Archives general discussion thread or subforum?

item.title: Chaotic Dreams
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hermskii)
item.dc:creator: Hermskii
item.content:encoded:
On the left side of the Beyond Unreal home page in the "Hosted Sites" section there is a listing for "Chaotic Dreams". The link is broken. Please fix it.


The correct url to the Chaotic Dreams home page is:

http://chaoticdreams.org/chaosut/


The correct url to the Chaotic Dreams Forum is:

http://www.forums.chaoticdreams.org/index.php



Thank you!

item.title: Where'd my Inbox go?
item.author: invalid@example.com (evilgrins)
item.dc:creator: evilgrins
item.content:encoded:
I could swear I had an inbox when I first joined this forum, but I can't find it anywhere now.

Did BU get rid of the inboxes?

I'm mainly asking as someone made a claim to making this Warlord skin...

...and our chat on that was in my inbox.

I wanna credit him, as I've used that skin on Warlord's on maps I've...

Where'd my Inbox go?
